name: Beaked The Cultist
description:
Adds Beaked the Cultist as a new playable character. 

Recent Changes: 
- Shadow Fade reworked. 
- Quantum Egg upgrades Crazy Rituals' cards. 
- Art for Stick / Stick Smack, by MagicHampster. 
- Struggle now triggers end-of-turn effects. 
- Fake Out no longer crashes with gigantic decks. 
- Added tooltip for Volatile Misfortune.
- Awakened Form behind-the-scenes refactoring.
- Lagavulin's Ferocity+ no longer crashes.
- Updated credits.

If you contributed and don't see your name in the credits, please let us know!
